text: “Ndithu sadaka (za Zakaati) ndi za mafukara, masikini, ogwira ntchito yosonkhetsa sadakazo, owalimbitsa mitima yawo (pa Chisilamu amene alowa kumene), kuombolera akapolo (kuti akhale afulu), kuthandizira amene ali m’ngongole; kuzipereka pa njira ya Allah; ndi kuwapatsa a paulendo (omwe alibe choyendera). Ili ndi lamulo lochokera kwa Allah, ndipo Allah Ngodziwa kwabasi, Ngwanzeru zakuya
